fullText: This year, @StanfordHAI scholars addressed what people wanted to know: Can we trust AI therapists? Is workplace automation serving workers? Our most-read stories reveal a society grappling with AI's real-world impact on mental health, privacy, and power: https://t.co/ZxTpkoIZsD

This bodes ill. Readers used to outnumber non-readers 2 to 1. Now non-readers outnumber readers 3 to 1.

It's hard to imagine a change of that magnitude not having significant effects. https://t.co/1Z4nZPVBfg
